topic.title: Switchtec Reset Handling and Propagation

body.p: Swichtec supports both PCIe Base Specification compliant reset handling/propagation behavior as well as some custom reset handling sequences.

fig.title: Example reset propagation through two hosts, two partitions, and a cascaded switch

body.p: In Figure 1 we demonstrate various reset propagation paths through a two partition upper switch connected to two hosts upstream and connected to drives and a cascaded switch downstream.

entry.p: Host A toggles PERST# (out of band)
Reset USP, Clear PCIe sticky bits in USP
Propagate PERST# to downstream EPs if PERST# is defined, Link Down on DSP
Link Down on USP, do NOT clear PCIe sticky bits
Propagate Hot Reset to all downstream EPs, Link Down on DSP
Host A sends Secondary Bus Reset (inband SBR) to USP
Propagate Hot Reset to all downstream EPs, Link Down on DSP
Host A sends Secondary Bus Reset (inband SBR) to DSPs
Link Down on DSP, do NOT clear PCIe sticky bits
Host A sends Function Level Reset (inband FLR) to MGMT EP
Management EP or NT EP is reset
Host A sends Function Level Reset (inband FLR) to DSPs
Host B toggles PERST# (out of band)
Reset USP, Clear PCIe sticky bits in USP
Propagate PERST# to downstream EPs if PERST# is defined, Link Down on DSP

row.entry: Reset USP, Clear PCIe sticky bits in USP

entry.p: Propagate PERST# to downstream EPs if PERST# is defined, Link Down on DSP
Link Down on USP, do NOT clear PCIe sticky bits
Propagate Hot Reset to all downstream EPs, Link Down on DSP

row.entry: Link Down on USP, do NOT clear PCIe sticky bits

entry.p: Propagate Hot Reset to all downstream EPs, Link Down on DSP
Host B sends Secondary Bus Reset (inband SBR) to USP
Propagate Hot Reset to all downstream EPs, Link Down on DSP

row.entry: Link Down on USP, do NOT clear PCIe sticky bits

entry.p: Propagate Hot Reset to all downstream EPs, Link down on DSP
Host B sends Secondary Bus Reset (inband SBR) to DSPs
Propagate Hot Reset to all downstream EPs, Link Down on DSP

row.entry: Link Down on USP, do NOT clear PCIe sticky bits

entry.p: Propagate Hot Reset to all downstream EPs, Link down on DSP
Host B sends Function Level Reset to Switch A MGMT/NT EP (inband FLR)
Management EP or NT EP is reset
Host B sends Function Level Reset to Switch B MGMT/NT EP (inband FLR)

row.entry: Management EP or NT EP is reset
